-- | A binding to the X11 authentication library
--   
--   A Haskell binding to the X11 authentication library.
@package Xauth
@version 0.1

module Graphics.X11.Xauth
data Xauth
Xauth :: [CChar] -> [CChar] -> Xauth
xauthName :: Xauth -> [CChar]
xauthData :: Xauth -> [CChar]
familyLocal, familyLocalHost, familyKrb5Principal, familyNetname, familyWild :: CUShort
getAuthByAddr :: CUShort -> [CChar] -> [CChar] -> [CChar] -> IO (Maybe Xauth)
instance Show Xauth
instance Read Xauth
